title: Rose, lychee and raspberry tart
description: Rose water flavoured pastry, filled with raspberry and lychee crème, caramelised almonds and fresh raspberries.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a piping bag, food processor and a flan tin.
ingredients: 4 free-range eggs, 3 yolks only, 1 whole, beaten for egg wash
1 x 450g tin lychees, drained and broken up
200g/7oz caster sugar (exactly the same weight as the raspberries)
